name: eXecutor
description:
Vintage military robots was discovered after archeologists dig the site of old city in unmanned deserted island. Robots take power and start full-scale military activity by fixing each others and build new ones.

As a part of wider Special Operation Forces your mission is to gain full control on island before its too late. Humanity cant tolerate this any more. CO2 emission is too Hight and we cant tolerate this any more. Robots participate in all kinds of criminal activity from crypto mining to drugs and weapons production. Use any weapons you find. Stay sharp. Save humanity!
